verses.verse: The <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> me, and carried me <S%H3318>out<s%> in the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and set me <S%H5117>down<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1237>valley<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> was <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H6106>bones,<s%>

And caused me to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> them round <S%H5439>about:<s%> <S%H5439><s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H1237>valley;<s%> and, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> they were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3002>dry.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> can <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H2421>live?<s%> And I <S%H559>answered,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H3045>knowest.<s%>

Again he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H5012>Prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6106>bones,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, O ye <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H6106>bones,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> unto <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6106>bones;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will cause <S%H7307>breath<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> into you, and ye shall live: <S%H2421><s%>

And I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H1517>sinews<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you, and will bring <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you, and <S%H7159>cover<s%> <S%H5921><s%> you with <S%H5785>skin,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H7307>breath<s%> in you, and ye shall <S%H2421>live;<s%> and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

So I <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> I was <S%H6680>commanded:<s%> and as I <S%H5012>prophesied,<s%> there <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H6963>noise,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> a <S%H7494>shaking,<s%> and the <S%H6106>bones<s%> came <S%H7126>together,<s%> <S%H6106>bone<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H6106>bone.<s%>

And when I <S%H7200>beheld,<s%> <S%H2009>lo,<s%> the <S%H1517>sinews<s%> and the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them, and the <S%H5785>skin<s%> <S%H7159>covered<s%> <S%H5921><s%> them <S%H4605>above:<s%> but there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7307>breath<s%> in them.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H5012>Prophesy<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H935>Come<s%> from the <S%H4480>four<s%> <S%H702><s%> <S%H7307>winds,<s%> O <S%H7307>breath,<s%> and <S%H5301>breathe<s%> upon <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2026>slain,<s%> that they may <S%H2421>live.<s%>

So I <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me, and the <S%H7307>breath<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into them, and they <S%H2421>lived,<s%> and stood <S%H5975>up<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> an <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2428>army.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6106>bones<s%> are the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they <S%H559>say,<s%> Our <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H3001>dried,<s%> and our <S%H8615>hope<s%> is <S%H6>lost:<s%> we are cut <S%H1504>off<s%> for our parts.

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> O my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H6913>graves,<s%> and cause you to come <S%H5927>up<s%> out of your <S%H4480>graves,<s%> <S%H6913><s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> you <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when I have <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H6913>graves,<s%> O my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and brought you <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> out of your <S%H4480>graves,<s%> <S%H6913><s%>

And shall <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in you, and ye shall <S%H2421>live,<s%> and I shall <S%H5117>place<s%> you <S%H5921>in<s%> your own <S%H127>land:<s%> then shall ye <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it, and <S%H6213>performed<s%> it, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> again <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Moreover, <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> thee <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6086>stick,<s%> and <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it, For <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H2270>companions:<s%> then <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H6086>stick,<s%> and <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it, For <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> the <S%H6086>stick<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his companions: <S%H2270><s%>
And <S%H7126>join<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> into <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6086>stick;<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> in thine <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And <S%H834>when<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Wilt thou <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5046>show<s%> us <S%H4100>what<s%> thou meanest by <S%H428>these?<s%>

Say <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6086>stick<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H2270>fellows,<s%> and will <S%H5414>put<s%> them <S%H5921>with<s%> him, even <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H6086>stick<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6086>stick,<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> in mine <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
And the <S%H6086>sticks<s%> <S%H834>whereon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thou <S%H3789>writest<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

And <S%H1696>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H996><s%> the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they be <S%H1980>gone,<s%> and will <S%H6908>gather<s%> them on every <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H5439><s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> their own land: <S%H127><s%>

And I will <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> to them <S%H3605>all:<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall they be <S%H2673>divided<s%> into <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> any more at <S%H5750>all:<s%> <S%H5750><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall they <S%H2930>defile<s%> themselves any <S%H5750>more<s%> with their <S%H1544>idols,<s%> nor with their detestable <S%H8251>things,<s%> nor with <S%H3605>any<s%> of their <S%H6588>transgressions:<s%> but I will <S%H3467>save<s%> them out of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> their dwelling <S%H4186>places,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> they have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and will <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> them: so shall they <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H1961>be<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall be <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them; and they <S%H3605>all<s%> shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd:<s%> they shall also <S%H1980>walk<s%> in my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H8104>observe<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them.

And they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H3427>dwelt;<s%> and they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5921>therein,<s%> even <S%H1992>they,<s%> and their <S%H1121>children,<s%> and their <S%H1121>children's<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5769>forever:<s%> and my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> shall be their <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

Moreover I will <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> with them; it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them: and I will <S%H5414>place<s%> them, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> them, and will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of them <S%H5769>forevermore.<s%>
My <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> also shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> them: yea, I will <S%H1961>be<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> do <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of them <S%H5769>forevermore.<s%>
